alert.note: Alert for Carson; Hutchinson; Moore; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 8:24PM CDT until April 25 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sanford, or 9 miles west of Borger, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Borger, Fritch, Stinnett, Sanford and Lake Meredith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
